item.title: Ferrari: Federated Feature Unlearning via Optimizing Feature Sensitivity
item.description: Ferrari, a novel federated feature unlearning framework, minimizes feature sensitivity via Lipschitz continuity, enabling effective and privacy-preserving data removal without full client participatio…
